sentences.sContent: The fertilized ovule becomes the seed , and the ovary becomes the fruit.
sentences.sContent_eng: The fertilized ovule becomes the seed , and the ovary becomes the fruit.
sentences.sCn: 已受精的卵子成为种子，而子房变成了果实。

sentences.sContent: That could mean munching on live sea horses or hard-boiled fertilized duck eggs — though steering clear of adulterated chicken breasts.
sentences.sContent_eng: That could mean munching on live sea horses or hard-boiled fertilized duck eggs — though steering clear of adulterated chicken breasts.
sentences.sCn: 那可意味着大声咀嚼生海马或是煮过熟了的已受精鸭蛋，虽然避开了掺入次级品的鸡胸肉。
